column5: Super Bowl ready!  Comfortable and spacious 2 bed/2.5 home in the heart of Houston with easy access to all our great city has to offer.  * Hobby Airport - 3.5 miles * Downtown Houston including BBVA Compass Stadium, Toyota Center and Minute Maid Park - 5 miles * NRG Arena - 6.5 miles  We are within walking distance from food and shopping including HEB and Best Buy!
